summary: acpi: Fix suspend with Xen PV
details:
acpi: Fix suspend with Xen PV

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.9 by commit b96903b7fc8c82ddfd92df4cdd83db3e567da0a5, it was introduced in version v6.1.2 by commit b1898793777fe10a31c160bb8bc385d6eea640c6. For more details please see the references link.
